TopicTitle: Bring back the Green Iron Crown!

Articles.Content: Its official. Time to bring him back! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

He was an experiment, he got out of hand, he caused some problems, and now he's gone to his reward. Sorry, but I'm afraid there's no coming back from that. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
